info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued September 3 at 8:14PM MST until September 3 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona...
* Until 900 PM MST.
* At 814 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near San Tan Village Mall to near Chandler Fashion Center Mall to near South Mountain Park, moving northwest at 25 mph.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph.
SOURCE...Trained weather spotters.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 137 and 179. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 205. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 6.
Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Paradise Valley, Sun Lakes, Laveen, East Mesa, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Falcon Field Airport, and Salt River Indian Community.
info.instruction:
Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 9:00 PM MST. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 9:00 PM MST. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:00 PM MST. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 9:00 PM MST. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
